divs: Sighting Detailswent outside to smoke and looked up and seen 2 bright lights they just appeared out of nowhere and i watched them for a few mins then one started traveling away then shortly then next one went the same way. then a few mins later a light blinked then went away in a different location. this is not the first time i have seen 2 lights together do this around here. i know what i saw i watch the night sky all the time
